name: Girls of Hentai Mosaic
description:
Girls of Hentai Mosaic is a puzzle game in which you need to correctly swap tiles to restore the images of girls. The game challenges you to then let you relax and enjoy the original hentai art.
As a bonus, you get the opportunity to look at the girls without any clothes. Especially good in this mode will help cheating, which is activated by the "F" button.

Features:
  • Girls can undress
  • 100 achievements
  • Gallery with controls using ← →
  • Relaxing music by HateBit
  • Cheat mode (F)
  • Nice relaxing gameplay
